entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect Parameter Order in ArgumentException Constructor in IfNullOrWhitespace Method #110294
  • [NativeAOT] Disable unsupported scenario tests in hardware intrinsics test template #110293
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce LeftJoin LINQ operator #110292
  • Concrete type information does not propagate through struct fields #110290
    Future

Closed

  • Inconsistent large response content validation in HttpClient #75631
    10.0.0
  • Consider using pooled buffers for HttpClient response buffering #62845
    10.0.0
  • Can't resolve dependencies in published .net core applications #33040
  • Remove Misleading Claim About Java's Value Types in Object Stack Allocation Documentation #110295
  • [API Proposal]: Add left join #97492
    Future
  • System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests time out on win-x86 #110289
  • Throw PlatformNotSupportedException when encountering VT_RECORD in Marshal.GetObjectForNativeVariant #36603

PullRequests

Merged

  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove usage of HP libunwind on Apple platforms #110023
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add pMethod param to getHelperFtn EE-JIT API #110267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable removal of try/catch if the try can't throw. #110273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable GFNI tests for NAOT #110250
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable AltJits build for LoongArch64 and RiscV64 #110282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
